pages.text: The five primal aspects may be rather expensive to obtain for some, however, to certain souls, there is an alternative: $(marked)Sacrificial Rites$(). $(br)These rites require a mundane item power of the essence to obtain, and a matching soul type, though $(marked)Magan Souls$() may perform all of them.
One exception is the $(marked)Compression of the Soul$(), which can be executed by anyone. $(br)This rite's aspect is $(d)魔力$().

All of these rites will search for up to five creatures plus one player in close proximity of the nexus. At the end of the rite, these creatures will be killed, and may drop essences of the rite's aspect. The chance for each to drop an essence is about 75%, though the sacrifice of a player always seems to yield results.

All of these rites deal different kinds of damage.$(br)It should be noted that the matching soul might also use the rite to their advantage, as they'll get the closest to the element they represent ever. $(br)However, only prepared souls might take that step.
